It is owned and operated by [[Harrah's Entertainment]]. Currently, the casino has {{convert|120000|sqft|abbr=on}} of gaming space, with over 2,800 slot machines and over 90 table games.http://www.harrahsstlouis.com/casinos/harrahs-stlouis/casino-gambling/index.html ==See also== *[[List of casinos in Missouri]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.harrahsstlouis.com/casinos/harrahs-stlouis/hotel-casino/property-home.shtml Official Site] {{Caesars Entertainment}} [[Category:Caesars Entertainment Corporation]] [[Category:Casinos in Missouri]] [[Category:Hotels in Missouri]] [[Category:Riverboat casinos]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in St. Louis County, Missouri]] [[Category:Visitor attractions in St. Louis County, Missouri]]
